faq_1_q: How can I add a new transaction?
faq_1_a: You can add a new transaction (income or expense) by clicking the "Add" button at the top right of the application. A form will open where you can enter all the details.
faq_2_q: Where can I see my budgets?
faq_2_a: The "Budgets" section in the side menu allows you to view and manage your budgets by category. You can see how much you have spent and how much you have left for each one.
faq_3_q: Is it possible to export my transactions?
faq_3_a: Yes, on the "Transactions" page, you will find an "Export PDF" button. Clicking it will generate and download a PDF file with the list of your transactions.
faq_4_q: How can I change the application theme?
faq_4_a: Go to the "Settings" page. There you will find an "Appearance" section with a switch to change between the light and dark theme.
faq_5_q: What if I want to delete all my data?
faq_5_a: On the "Settings" page, under "Data Management", there is a button to "Delete all transactions". Please note that this action is irreversible and will delete all data from your browser.
